sentences.sContent: an attempt to rally support for the party
sentences.sCn: 为政党争取支持的努力

synos.tran: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
团结；集合；恢复健康、力量等

phrases.pCn: 赛前动员会，鼓舞士气的集会

trans.tranCn: 集合， 团结；恢复， 重新振作
trans.tranOther: to come together, or to bring people together, to support an idea, a political party etc
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc
